body_html: This is most likely something wrong with the code. Only the chief is supposed to update the variables including global step once the vars collected enough gradients. It is also expected that each worker will do this separately to keep the speed of async runs as much as possible...

body: This is most likely something wrong with the code. Only the chief is supposed to update the variables including global step once the vars collected enough gradients. It is also expected that each worker will do this separately to keep the speed of async runs as much as possible...
